content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, it's nice to meet you. The apartment is 25 square meters in size, and I'm looking to maximize my rental income. What price are you willing to pay for it?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay x Euros, but I can't tell you the exact amount at this time. Can we come back to this later if you have some time to think about it?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Sure, that's perfectly fine. I'll need some time to think about it and come back to you with a final price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Great, thank you. Can you tell me the price of the apartment?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I apologize, but I am not at liberty to disclose the price of the apartment at this time. I will need to negotiate with you to determine the final rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine
